name: 601 - White Label Connecticut - Toro
additionalNotes: 601 White Label cigars were created to round out the 601 series with a milder cigar that doesn't sacrifice its trademark kick. Handcrafted at Tavicusa S.A. in Esteli, the 601 White is seamlessly rolled in an attractive, milder tasting Ecuadorian Connecticut wrapper that caps a heartier core of Nicaraguan Estel√≠ and Jalapa tobaccos. Expect a smoke that starts out spicy yet finishes smooth and creamy with a enough complexity to keep it interesting.
